message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. I think this is a fair price given its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $13,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I'm asking for $13,750. This price is still very fair considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $13,500. Can you consider that?
